original_title: Storybook Classics: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
overview: independent, Animated - Tom Sawyer is a delightful cartoon adaptation of the timeless children's book The Adventures of Tom Sawyer, Mark Twain's classic tale of boyhood adventure featuring the loveable Tom and his happy-go-lucky friend, Huckleberry Finn
title: Storybook Classics: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
